text: Hi everyone, I'm trying to test my email template in different email clients on HubSpot...There I found that on outlook only inner padding and spacing around is removed. Can someone help me out with this? I'm also trying to add hspace and vspace to the source code in rich text module yet it's not working.

bad news for you. The problem is how HubSpot structures their emails.

The margin (outer spacing) is applied to the TD which cannot actually have a margin.

The padding does get applied but padding doesn’t display correctly in outlook.

margins when applied in the  drag n drop email builder only add the `margin` property not `Margin` which outlook doesn’t properly read.

If you need pixel perfection using a coded template is the way to go. If you just need a quick email the drag n drop is okay
<@UEY5VRQHE> Add that margin and padding to the module not the group
<@UEY5VRQHE> for this you can use coded template instead of drag n drop, bcoz in coded template you can use *mso* for outlook.
